column1: English Sent: Gondwana land: It is the southern part of the ancient super continent Pangea with Angara Land in the northern part.
Hindi Tansl: goMdavAnA BUmiH ye prAcIna viSAla mahAxvIpa pEMjiyA kA xakRiNawama BAga hE
column2: jisake uwwara meM aMgArA BUmi hE.

column1: Anu Translation:  yaha uwwarI BAga meM angara BUmi se prAcIna bahuwa bade mahAxvIpa pangea kA xakRiNI kiraxAra hE ki goYndvoYnoY BUmi
